abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Structural
            Adjustment Institutional Support (SAIS) Project is to
            facilitate implementation of the Structural Adjustment
            Program, while its long term goal is to rebuild the
            Government's capacity to efficiently manage the
            economy. Specifically, the project will: 1) strengthen the
            capacity of core agencies, especially the Ministry of
            Finance and Economic Planning (MFEP), to formulate and
            implement economic policies in pursuit of structural
            adjustment objectives; 2) increase public sector
            productivity by supporting Government's efforts to
            overcome the skilled manpower shortages, rationalize civil
            services management and retrench surplus staff over 1986-88;
            and, 3) provide policy makers with timely information on the
            impact of reforms on the welfare of different population groups.
